personal_info.name: Youssef Wael
personal_info.title: Senior Flutter Developer | Cross-Platform Mobile Applications
personal_info.about_me: Senior Flutter Developer with 3+ years of experience designing and delivering high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications for e-commerce, education, real estate, POS, and HR sectors. Specialized in Flutter, Dart, Clean Architecture, and CI/CD pipelines. Proven ability to optimize app performance, deliver measurable business results — including reducing load times by up to 40% and cutting deployment cycles from days to hours. Published multiple apps on both Google Play and App Store.

technical_skills: RESTful APIs, Firebase, SQLite, and Hive
OOP, SOLID Principles, and Design Patterns
Git, GitHub, GitLab, and CI/CD pipelines

experience.title: Senior Flutter Developer
description_points: Developed and maintained high-quality Flutter applications using clean architecture and modular design.
Led app store deployments and managed post-launch optimization and support.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, scalable mobile solutions integrating APIs and hardware.
Optimized app performance, reducing load times by up to 40%.

experience.title: Flutter Developer
description_points: Developed and deployed Flutter applications for various government and enterprise clients.
Integrated third-party APIs, multilingual features, and complex state management solutions.
Enhanced application stability and performance through structured testing and code reviews.
Collaborated with UI/UX teams to deliver user-friendly and visually consistent interfaces.

projects.name: SabPay
projects.short_description: A secure, multilingual mobile payment application with real-time transaction updates.
projects.description: Sab Pay is a mobile payment platform developed using Flutter, offering secure transactions, multilingual (Arabic/English) interfaces, and seamless financial operations. The app ensures reliability through integrated payment APIs, real-time updates, and intuitive design.
features: App Store and Play Store deployment

projects.name: Ez Academy
projects.short_description: A cross-platform educational app for TOEFL and IELTS preparation.
projects.description: Ez Academy delivers online educational content for English proficiency exams like TOEFL and IELTS. It supports multilingual access, dynamic pricing, and in-app purchases for premium content, offering a smooth and engaging user experience.

projects.name: Restaurant Apps Suite
projects.short_description: A collection of restaurant e-commerce apps enabling seamless ordering and delivery.
projects.description: A suite of restaurant apps developed using Flutter, supporting online ordering, payment integration, and delivery tracking. Each app includes multilingual support, location-based features, and real-time order updates for enhanced user experience.

projects.name: Najeh
projects.short_description: A secure learning management system (LMS) for students in Kuwait schools.
projects.description: Najeh is a comprehensive LMS platform designed for school students in Kuwait. It offers subject-based courses that users can securely purchase and watch through the app. The application ensures content protection by disabling screenshots and screen recording. It integrates a reliable payment gateway and offers a seamless educational experience through intuitive navigation and high performance.
features: Secure playback (no screenshots or screen recording)
Payment gateway integration for course purchases
